document_data.name: Nilat
document_data.Description: He had tan skin, and long, dark hair braided on one side. His eyes were green, and he wore dark clothing.
document_data.Personality: Nilat enjoyed playing practical jokes on others.
document_data.Possessions: Nilat clad himself in ''[[elven chain mail]]'', and carried a magical [[longsword]] and [[longbow]] in battle. He also owned a ''[[ring of free action]]''.
document_data.History: Growing up as the third son of a lord, Nilat found he had no future as a noble and instead began working as a scout and hunter, naming himself a "guardian of the people." His penchant for practical jokes annoyed his family, who considered him their black sheep.
